summary: This mod adds onto Hearthfire's adoption system.  There are 36 new children, and 6 orphanages to hold the new children, one in Dawnstar, one in Winterhold, one in Solitude, one in Windhelm, one in Whiterun, and one in Markarth.  There are 4 of each excluded race, 2 boys and 2 girls. There are also new gifts added. No longer developing.
descriptionHtml:
I did not like the exclusion of most races from the Hearthfire content. This mod aims to right some of that, by adding children from races that were not represented in Hearthfire.

These new children need a place to live before you adopt them, so there are six new orphanages. The orphanages are located in Dawnstar, Solitude, Windhelm, Winterhold, Whiterun, and Markarth. The orphanages have their own personality to them, with different daily routines and such. They also have a donation chest, if you are feeling so generous.

Orphanage locations: The Solitude one is near the docks, the Windhelm one is on the outskirts near the stables, the Markarth one is close to the city gates/stables, the Winterhold one is behind the trader in the mountain side, the Whiterun one is near the brewery on the road, and the Dawnstar one is close to the Mythic Dawn museum.

Children Locations:
Dawnstar spot:
-Ingokn
-Kolfhe
Khajiit
-Rabinna
-Raksadarg
-Urjorahn
-Zahraji

Markarth spot:
-Mecius
-Fralvi
Orc
-Bugdub
-Gakkenfe
-Murob
-Ushag

Solitude spot:
-Pilpen
-Pritia
High elf
-Erissa
-Hecerilar
-Telindil
-Viranirn

Whiterun location:
-Pemeni
-Senynd
Dark elf
-Fadali
-Norusi
-Sedave
-Sodril

Windhelm location:
-Andre
-Lielle
Argonian
-Ah-Meese
-Gah-Ju
-Kal-Le
-Ram-Ku

Winterhold location:
-Maniel
-Thales
Wood elf
-Barann
-Celgi
-Forond
-Gildiir

Still W.I.P.

What is added:
-6 orphanages: Dawnstar, Solitude, Windhelm, Winterhold, Whiterun, Markarth
-36 children: 4 Argonian, 4 Dark Elf, 4 Wood Elf, 4 High Elf, 4 Khajit, 4 Orc, rest are a mix of standard child races.
-Donation system: Similar to donating to a beggar, just a donation chest in the orphanages.

Known Quirks:
-All children use the same basic voice set, so Argonian children will sound like Orc children, and so on.

Requires: HEARTHFIRE

Revision History:

>WolfIcePelt
>WolfPelt
>WoodenLadle (currently girls only)
-Edited Children A.I. to prevent some odd behavior
-Made Children More Child-like
-Childs Fishing Pole is in the potential vendor items list.

Credits:
-Tamriel Rebuilt – name generator

Notes:
This is final version.

Additional Notes:
Someone created a Skykids compatibility patch for my mod.  I am not sure entirely what SkyKids does overall, and this mod seems to fix what I don't have the time or knowledge how to fix:  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58016/?


Follow me on Facebook for updates: [url=https://www.facebook.com/ArronDominionProductions/]Arron Dominion Productions[/url]
author: Arron Dominion

files.name: Dominions Adoption Expansion v1_0_1
files.changelogHtml:
Children look more like children
Adoption gifts added, including fishing pole
Fixed some of the orphanage children A.I., so that they do not follow an adopted child
